## AbstractSegment.lineIntersection() method

Computes the list of points on the segment that intersect the given line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
lineIntersection(x1: number, y1: number, x2: number, y2: number): Array<PointXY>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  x1 | number |  |
|  y1 | number |  |
|  x2 | number |  |
|  y2 | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;PointXY&gt;

A list of intersecting points
